attributes.action: josie cunningham aborting her baby after 18wks to appear on big brother
attributes.additional_details: Josie Cunningham has openly admitted that she is aborting her perfectly healthy baby in order to appear on a television show called big brother. She is currently 18wks pregnant and doesn't know who the father is. This is absolutely disgusting and vile and should not be allowed. She's is murdering a life for fame and fortune
